label: A4B2C6D16E_cF232_203_e_c_f_eg_b-001
title: Tychite  (Na$_{6}$Mg$_{2}$SO$_{4}$(CO$_{3}$)$_{4}$) Structure
comments:
(Shiba, 1931) originally determined that tychite was in space group $Fd\overline{3}m$ \#227, and (Hermann, 1937) designated this as {\em Strukturbericht} symbol $H5_{6}$. 
 A reanalysis of the structure by (Schmidt, 2006) showed that there was no inversion site, and the structure is actually in space group $Fd\overline{3}$ \#203.  The two structures are not very different with an uncertainty in atomic positions of less than 1{\AA} bringing them into agreement. 
 This page describes the new structure. 
 For the (Shiba, 1931) structure \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B2C6D16E_cF232_227_e_c_f_eg_b-001}{see the $H5_{6}$ page}.
